website_summaries.verdict: Offers excellent cleansing with rich lather and a pleasant scent. Though it may be a bit drying for some, many more consumers rave about how it makes their skin look and feel.
pros: Earns praise for being effective for deep cleansing and for leaving skin feeling refreshed and clean
Has a pH balanced, oil-free formula that contains amino acids and a light scent
A bottle lasts, as a little cleanser goes a long way
cons: May be a bit drying on some skin types, especially for those whose skin is prone to dryness

customer_reviews.title: Unless they changed the formula, this is NOT the ...
customer_reviews.text: Unless they changed the formula, this is NOT the real thing. I was trying to avoid a trip to my dermatologist and order this instead. One, the consistency is completely off. I didn't think much of it, just thought they might of changed the formula. However the second I used it, I knew it's not the real thing. The one I get from my dermatologist's takes ALL my make up off with one wash, yes; mascara, eyeliner, eye shadow...etc. This one, does not, I have to use make up remover afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Real Elta Facewash
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the EltaMd foaming cleanser for years and this is not authentic. Has a strange smell and foams slightly different. I am not sure how this is allowed to be sold on Amazon under false pretenses. I hope this gets removed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I checked it against the light and noticed it was only 2/3 or less of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Qing Lei

customer_reviews.title: The specific product I received was of a different formula ...
customer_reviews.text: The specific product I received was of a different formula from the original. These items should be purchased at your local drug store or dermatologist's office. As for the Elta product brand, they work.
customer_reviews.author: nirmalla_hb

customer_reviews.title: Love the foaming action of the cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Love the foaming action of the cleanser, and that squeaky clean! There is no scent, and you can totally tell when you need a second washing (can't get away with not removing your makeup first) because you don't get that thick, frothy foam after 30 seconds. The only gripe I have with the product is the residue that is always hanging off the little plastic spout, and hardens after time. I guess it foams up a little bit at the mouth of the spout, and dries up, causing crusting, and it's annoying to have to scrape it off or the cleanser won't come out.
customer_reviews.author: Leelelilyleigh

customer_reviews.title: Love Elta but this was a little disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I love Elta lotions so had high hopes for this product, but it didn’t work as well as I had hoped, unfortunately. The face wash is okay, but it did not easily clean makeup off of my face or foam well. It is very thick and often clogs the nozzle. For the price it was a bit disappointing, although I’ll still use it until it’s done. It is still hypoallergenic and doesn’t contain toxic ingredients, which is a plus. On performance it didn’t work great for me though.
customer_reviews.author: BlaireTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Elta MD???  hmmmm...
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know what was in this bottle. I, too received it 3/4 full. The consistency and smell was waaaaay wrong. It is supposed to be a pearly light color and smells of citrus. This bottle had a thick white creamy substance that smelled like rancid rose water. NOT good. Returned same day.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Love this foaming cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: My son bought me a Clarisonic for my birthday and he included this foaming cleanser. My husband started using it - so now it was disappearing faster than I wanted. Didn't want to purchase it from a dermatologist - only because I live in a rural area and would have to drive 45+ mins. I was excited to find it on Amazon! It works great.
customer_reviews.author: ProudMiMi

customer_reviews.title: I love Elta MD sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I like Elta MD sunscreen and lip protectant but this foaming wash didn’t work for me. The smell reminds me is Nair hair removal cream and the cleaning action seems weak. It doesn’t clear blackheads and seems to dry my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dy

customer_reviews.title: Is this really Elta MD foaming cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have use this product for many years and I have always purchased Elta MD products from my doctor. I was pleased to see it offered on Amazon.com but now realize this was a mistake. The package arrived quickly but the container was not wrapped and the bottle was half filled, the cleanser had a different feel from previous purchases. As a faithful customer of Amazon I am calling this to your attention.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen a

customer_reviews.title: When we buy FOAMING wash, we mean it.
customer_reviews.text: It comes out as cream. No foam at all no matter how hard your two hands try. It feels like you put cream on your face and something remains after wash. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: TakeItSlow

customer_reviews.title: My favorite facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite facial cleanser. I usually wash my hands before washing my face. While my hands are still wet from having washed them, I will put one pump of this foaming facial cleanser in my hands and apply to my face. After about 10 seconds of scrubbing gently on my face it creates a dense foam.... do not expect a bubbly foam like a bubble bath... this is not meant to create suds but a thick dense foam. This helps clean out the pores without any air pockets getting in the way. My skin always feels so fresh and deeply cleanser afterwards. I have normal-oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: EShiba

customer_reviews.title: Not a makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great cleanser, but does not remove makeup well at all. I did like how this lathered, but what’s the point if it doesn’t remove stuff? If it doesn’t remove my tinted moisturizer, then it won’t remove other impurities. It didn’t strip my skin of oils, though. And it has a nice feel and no scent to speak of. Did not cause any irritation for my rosacea skin. However, since I felt like I had to tug away to get the color off my face, I did end up with some redness where I had to gently scrub. I much prefer The Ordinary squamous cleanser. Similar cleanser but a much more effective and still very gentle formula.
customer_reviews.author: Lee-lah

customer_reviews.title: Second one
customer_reviews.text: This is now my to go cleanser, I have very sensitive, easily-break-out skin type whenever I use a wrong product on my face, this one never cause any trouble for me, and also goes very gentle on my skin, what I usually do is to use some warm water to wash my face directly and gently ro open my pores (hopefully) but mainly cuz it feels so nice, then I get some drops of this product on my hand, make it foamy using both hands and then apply to my face gently doing circular massage on desired area for around 30 seconds-1 minutes, afterwards rinse it with warm water. Of course follow up with your regular skin care routine :)
customer_reviews.author: Zi Miao

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I'm 59 and have dry skin. I am IN LOVE with this product. I do not detect a scent, one pump is all you will need. It was packaged well. The box was not damaged. It really lathers! Follow the instructions. Squeeze the product into the palm of your hand. Wet your other hand and mix the two together, rub onto the face and add more water and it and the lather just keeps on forming. I used a washrag to remove all of the residue. It really cleaned my face and did not strip it at all. Very, very pleased and will not buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: ukulele lady

customer_reviews.title: not good enough for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Overall I think it is a good product, but I won't buy it again. Pros: 1. It is very gentle, so people with sensitive skin might like it. 2. It has safe ingredients. Cons: 1. With the word "Foaming" in its name, I expect it has thick, rich foam, just like Method's Foaming Hand Soap. But the fact is that, you really need to wait for at least 20 seconds and it didn't generate rich foam, at least, not this bottle I got. 2. I tried to be very patient when using it, but I got clogged pores.
customer_reviews.author: Meixian Wang

customer_reviews.title: This is not the same formula
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over a year and decided to order on amazon for the first time. Not the same product at all, there is a smell to it (not bad) but the real product does not have a strong sent like this, there is no foaming. overall it is not EltaMD you get when you buy from the dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Karsting

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine; Dispenser needs help!
customer_reviews.text: Product is okay... but dispenser spout gets gummy and clogged easily. You have to clean it out nearly every day. I don't think i'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, bottle isn't full.
customer_reviews.text: 1/3 of the bottle was empty, noticed when i put the bottle by the bathroom window and the light shined through. The foam was minor at first, but i noticed it foams more in a steamy bathroom. The cleansing was great at first, but after a couple weeks my skin barrier was gone and my skin wouldn't stop peeling ang cracking (never happened to me before with any product). The same thing happened to the facial skin of my ex, whom uses it religiously and is the person who introduced me to this product. Will be using the rest of the bottle without leaving the product on for long or will give to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: C. Marte

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have a sensitive skin, and acne prone. I tried a lot of acne medication fash wash but none of them works, plus they just dry out my skin even more. I was skeptical on trying this, but I gave it a shot since my dermatologist keep promoting it. I thought, let me support the products they displayed. I tried it, and it removes my make up all right, I don't need some makeup wipes (which saves me money) and it doesn't dry out my skin. I ordered more here and will be ordering it for a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Inday

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price- a great cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t buy many skincare products but I love this cleanser! At first I was concerned that the price was expensive for a facial cleanser but I happily discovered that a pea-sized amount is sufficient to lather your face and neck! I have sensitive skin and this gently but thoroughly cleans makeup and sunscreen from my skin. It has a great scent and leaves your face clean and soft-not dry. It is great to use before the Barrier Renewal Complex and UV Daily MoIsturizing Facial Sunscreen. I wish the cleanser came in a smaller container to use in the shower but the pump fits nicely on my bathroom counter.
customer_reviews.author: Radar EAM

customer_reviews.title: I think they sell returned product. I found a piece of hair inside package, smell and texture completely off.
customer_reviews.text: For me, the item came in unsealed package. The paper box that contains the facial cleanser bottle is unsealed and ruptured. I found a piece of little curly black hair on the cleanser bottle, inside the paper package. The bottle is 2/3 full. The smell and texture of this facial cleanser is completely different from the ones I owned before. I actually put them side by side, looked and smelled. This one is more whitish creamy without the usual smell it had. It feels more like some random hand lotion that someone put in. I dont trust it enough to put on my face. Don't buy from here if it's your first time trying this product.
customer_reviews.author: yicheng shao

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Well, Great for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I use this. I have rosacea and he has eczema. We have sensitive skin. This cleanser does not irritate our skin AND our faces are clean. We noticed our blackheads are kept at a minimum and we don’t break out. We use twice a day without issue. A good, trustworthy daily cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Raeil

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Fake product
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, was not the cleanser I got from my dermatologist this is fake cream based face wash in which the bottle does come half empty. The box was folded and broken not sealed. This shouldn't be sold and fooling people.
customer_reviews.author: S. Leiva

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had breakouts on her face. We tried many products which didn't work and also some prescription stuff my doctor recommended. I finally took her to a dermatologist who had her use this. It cleared her skin up within days. She no longer has breakouts except for one time when she ran out of this. Once we ordered it and she started using it again, her skin cleared up and is so pretty and no breakouts, which is super important for a teenager. I love this stuff. I think it is a miracle product. I had my doubts since nothing else worked, but it really works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work OK, but smells bad!
customer_reviews.text: I use other EltaMD products and they work great. I have rosacea and need a mild cleanser. Cetaphil and CeraVe are OK but not great, so I thought I'd try this one. EltaMD Foaming Facial Cleanser calms my rosacea well but after using it, my hands and face smell strange. The closest way to describe it is like a very mild fishy-smell. And the smell lingers in your skin for a few hours. Others have said this isn't a genuine product, but I have no reference point to confirm that. All I know is even if it works, the smell is enough to keep me from using it anymore. Guess I'll keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: S Larsen

customer_reviews.title: The Best Facial Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful, gentle cleanser that makes your face feel clean but not chapped or raw. You have to make sure to massage it on your face for at least 30 seconds to give the bubbles time to foam up. Really nice, clean feeling, but not harsh. Highly recommend for sensitive or aging skin types!
customer_reviews.author: EO

customer_reviews.title: Nice lather, but very drying
customer_reviews.text: It does form a nice rich, thick leather, however I found it to be very stripping and drying, even for my oily acne-prone skin. I does effectively remove makeup. It's not a terrible cleanser for the right skin type. It just didn't suit my skin.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Both a cleanser and eye makeup remover!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cleanser for several years. I LOVE it, but especially the fact that it removes your eye makeup without stinging your eyes. You can actually open your eyes while it’s on your lids and it doesn’t hurt. I hate removing makeup with eye makeup remover and any form of cotton or Kleenex. It hurts. This is a great cleanser and gentle o the skin and eyes
customer_reviews.author: Joyous

customer_reviews.title: Does not foam, at all, not even slightly
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to this product, unfortunately, the consistency was that of hand cream and not a foaming cleanser. Doesn't feel like it's actually cleaning, just moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: George Stoll

customer_reviews.title: The best facial cleanser ever used
customer_reviews.text: This facial cleanser is definitely the best product I have ever used. Of course everyone has their own skin condition. My face is usually kind oily during summer but dry in winter. This cleanser doesn’t feel dry at all after using and has a very good cleaning function. It is a little hard to foam it by hand but definitely is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: my36

customer_reviews.title: Patience & Consistency
customer_reviews.text: So I'm a 20 year old girl. I've been getting a lot of stress acne, which stresses me out even more. This formula is gentle but very effective. I use it once in the morning and then once at night. I moisturize with CeraVe. I drink a lot of water and exercise too! Be patient with this, and you should see results around 2-3 weeks! Everyone's skin is different but I'm reviewing this because it really worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Deepak Misra

customer_reviews.title: Not foaming
customer_reviews.text: This product specifically states "foaming" but either due to the shelf life or the heat of shipping, it does not foam but has a horrible texture. Unfortunately I was not completely out of the foaming cleanser that I was using at the time so I did not open it for a couple of weeks after delivery. At that time it was too late to return and this is not a cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent, basically Cetaphil in an EltaMD bottle
customer_reviews.text: In a side-by-side comparison with a sample of the real thing, this is clearly a fraudulent product. Different smell, different consistency, different texture. It is basically Cetaphil in an Elta bottle. I won't be buying this or any other dermatologist-recommended products from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n Jenny

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I have the most sensitive, acne-prone skin ever. This has been a life-saved! I wear tons of makeup to cover my scars and all it takes is one simple rinse with this and ALL makeup is gone. It was prescribed from my dermatologist who is legit in Philadelphia. Don’t listen to these trolls who say it’s half full; I’ve been using this for 5 years and ordering it from amazon and I have NEVER had a problem
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: BEST PORE CLEANSER EVER
customer_reviews.text: This foaming cleanser will clear up your skin, and empty your pores. Bought my first bottle from my dermatologist... this is a little more cost effective to order with Amazon Prime. I even made my teenager a believer! One pump in the shower, put on the face and neck and leave on 30 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: RéOnFire

customer_reviews.title: Best for acne and sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I tried everything from best seller face washes to expensive ones BUT this was a game changer totally for me. It worked wonders for my new acne experience in life ever. This is very effective in maintaining the ph balance of skin and It’s my holy grail. My dermatologist recommended this and since it’s the only product I use for my day and night skincare routine. Highly highly recommend and there is no side effects for me.
customer_reviews.author: Monalisa Singh

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It was a little inconvenient when opening this facial cleanser for the first time, but it was convenient afterwards because it was squeezed. I am a mixed oil skin, it is very gentle to use and does not irritate the skin. You only need to squeeze once to wash your face. It is also prone to foaming. After using it for a while, I found that my acne was really less than before.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: 5 oz in new bottle - NOT 7 oz
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but something is amiss here. The bottle didn't seem filled...I held it up to the light and got suspicious. I then poured out the product into a liquid measuring cup and it was 5 ounces, not 7 ounces. Now even with some liquid adhering to the inside of the bottle and the pump - it still was extremely short on liquid volume as stated on the plastic bottle. So - Amazon, better check this supplier / manufacturer as this is not up to your standards.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Seattle

customer_reviews.title: leaves your face dirty, and if you have make up on
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. This does not foam at all, leaves your face dirty, and if you have make up on, it does not remove any at all. It says "Foaming Facial Cleanser" they must have put a moisturizer in the bottle because this is NOT a cleanser. When you wet your face and rub this "cleanser" on it feels you're rubbing on moisturizer with water. If you want to purchase a cleanser, then this is not for you. It DOES NOT clean your face.
customer_reviews.author: cucuyo

customer_reviews.title: Great daily cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I’m 34 with sensitive skin, redness, and occasional breakouts and some beginning fine lines. I consider myself a beauty product junkie. I’ve tried several high end cleansers and this is better than the rest. My skins looks and feels great after using. Not too harsh but cleanses. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be aware.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is indeed real product because the foam and scent are exactly the same with the real one. However, when i open the package, the box is open and the battle is half full.
customer_reviews.author: Boyan

customer_reviews.title: EltaMd
customer_reviews.text: It cleans nice and leaves my face feeling refreshed after use. I have red acne ridden skin; I was hoping this would clear it up. I've used over half the bottle and it hasn't seem to help that much, but maybe if I use it a little longer
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this facial cleanser so much. It is literally suitable for sensitive skin!!! And it cleans my face without feeling dry. That is to say, it is moisturizing my skin and has good hydration. I have use this product for several years. I highly recommend this amazing product to ladies who have dry and sensitive skin!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Didn't clear acne, but didn't make it worse
customer_reviews.text: I can't say this product made my skin worse, but it definitely didn't make it any better. It never dried my skin out so that's a plus. However I really didn't like the feeling it left after it was washed off. It was almost a sticky or tacky feeling. It foamed very nicely and smelled pleasant, but for a product that is supposed to clear acne, I would never purchase it again. I had much better luck with Retsiliney.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great foaming wash. It's perfect, has no detectable fragrance, is concentrated, doesn't dry my skin, so it is truly moisturizing. There's definitely a tingling sensation when washing so the amino acids are activated. Another feature that is wonderful is the pump bottle only dispenses a small amount of the product so you can control how much you are using. I will be ordering this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Quality and smell
customer_reviews.text: I love this it’s amazing I use it everyday it was little bit oil moisture kind where very soapy that it takes off mascara make up so nicely as well I don’t have to use make up remover. Has nice scent to it as well very light. It’s huge when I buy it I usually use it for good 3-5 month. I have been using this product now for over a year. I bought second time already. It’s best foam to wash my face with in early morning. I tried other products but this was the best.
customer_reviews.author: Nargiza

customer_reviews.title: Still love my Elta foaming Facial Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this foaming skin cleanser for several years now. When my local supplier stopped carrying it, I shopped online, since my face really responded well to it. I'm happy to say I continue to buy it from the same supplier and am very happy with the product and with the fast delivery when I reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Sue M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bottle not full
customer_reviews.text: This is ridiculous! I just ordered this product and my daughter noticed it felt lighter than it should. Held a flashlight up to it and this is the amount of face soap in the bottle. That does not seem right. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: LRoyal

customer_reviews.title: Excellet product
customer_reviews.text: I use EltaMD face lotion with sunscreen and have been very pleased with that product. Tried the face soap and am really liking how just a little bit foams for a nice face wash and rinses easily. The pump does clog every 3-4th use, but easily rinses free.
customer_reviews.author: MGaffer

customer_reviews.title: Works just as well as Doterra Clear skin
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of paying $30 a month for Doterra Clear Skin and decided to try this out. It lathers like no body's business and the bottle lasts a long time. It doesnt feel as intense as Doterra but my skin does feel super clean and has also stayed just as clear as it did with doterra. Never going back.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: I believe its doing my face better, but $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I don't know in the long run, but I think its a good product, and leaves a cleaner feel to the face. Really, its expensive for what amount it is IMO. I did not give it a 5 star since the soap clogs on the end of the pump and looks bad after it dries on the end of the pump. I don't like that it waste product on the end of the pump.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Half Empty
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering I read the reviews and notice a lot of poeple were complaining that the container was partially empty. I really love this facial cleanser and I was running low. So I took a change and ordered it. Sadly, right when I took it out the box I noticed it was very light in my hand. I put a light against it and yes, it was almost half way empty. Unfortunately, I wont be ordering it through Amazon anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Chirino

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I have pores and this foam feel amazing it does not smell much and you feel the cleanest. My face has cleared and toned thanks to this. It’s pricier to me than like drug store favorir washes, but it’s so worth it. I promise. I swear I’ve tried proactive, and a lot of cleansers and this has been my best investment.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face wash out there. It comes from an excellent line (sold at plastic surgery clinics), produces a nice thick foam and is great for removing make-up. I use it with my Clarisonic, which enhances the product even more. I have acne prone skin and this product is the only cleanser that is gentle enough to use without stripping the oil and moisture. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: No greater than bar soap
customer_reviews.text: I am almost done with this bottle and I use it twice a day. I used plain old bar soap for a while and to be honest, this works just the same for me. It's not a bad product by any means, I just can't justify spending the extra money when I don't believe it's done anything 'extra' for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: JRSorochty

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this but my face never feels clean. I’m not asking for squeaky clean, but this leaves a layer of oil or residue after I wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: Devoted Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: So luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: Very luxurious face wash. I’ve used their sunscreen for years and I have great respect for this brand. It is creamy and makes luxurious foam, but is not drying in the least. Don’t hesitate give it a try, your skin will thank you for it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and both use it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I was given samples from a spa for my 15 year old daughter to use. It cleans very well It spreads evenly over your face. It doesn’t take a lot to use. The foam is wonderful and once it is rinsed off your skin is left so smooth. Yes...I use it now also.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The best facial cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Its recommended by my dermatologist and its the best ! I recommend this to all friends and family. If you leave it on a bit it gives you a soft exfoliation. It lasts a long time and i use it daily
customer_reviews.author: Aless

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for sensitive skin and rosacea problem skin
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for sensitive and oily skin. It arrived intact, and yes, the bottle is not full, but certainly close to the 7 ounces in a bottle that holds 8 or 9. It doesn’t get a big lather, but one pump from the bottle and some warm water gives a wonderful micro-foam like lather for my whole face and neck within seconds. It isn’t drying like other expensive face washes I have been using and my face feels completely clean and fresh after, no tight over dry feeling. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C T.

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin soft and smooth
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face wash I have ever used. It was recommended by my dermatologist. It leaves my skin smooth, and soft. I like the way it doesn't use grit to clean. And it is made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: C M Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on skin
customer_reviews.text: I was using a really strong facial cleanser before I bought this so I was nervous about the transition, but so far this has been working with my skin! My skin still dries out after I wash my face but that tends to happen in the winter time. I don't get that fresh clean skin feeling after I wash my face which made me worry at first, but my skin doesn't seem to mind! The complaints of the soap getting dried and crusty on the nozzle are real though, so if they would change that it would make it easier to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not getting the fresh feeling.
customer_reviews.text: It’s gentle and it cleans well, but I was looking for a clean fresh feeling after I wash my face... not getting it with this product. It’s oil free but feels a bit oily, maybe that’s cuz it’s moisturizing. I’m not used to it.
customer_reviews.author: G Ko

customer_reviews.title: half full
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping I would be different than the other reviews but my bottle was also half full of cleanser... not sure what the issue is there? It definitely doesn’t foam up at all (was expecting it to be like a bath and body soap texture) but it’s more of a lotion that lathers up.
